channel.title: Tanks for three on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Tanks for three on Game6r

item.title: MechWar io
item.description: The process of playing for three Tanks in the labyrinth 9 is able to capture the attention of fans of combat battles for a long time. Choose the difficulty level and start your journey. At first, the location is covered in darkness, but as you move, it will open. Shoot at the tanks that you come across along the way, but beware of their retaliatory projectiles.

item.title: Tactics Core
item.description: This game is as close as possible to real combat conditions. It is just for those who have always wanted to try their hand at driving a battle tank. You have to take part in the battle of armored vehicles, shoot at enemies and dodge their shots. To hit the enemy, you will have to take into account the strength of the wind, the severity of the projectile and other factors.

item.title: Tank Commander
item.description: The crew of the tank, which you will control, has been assigned a combat mission, for which you need to destroy the entire city, destroy all buildings and vehicles. Move through the streets and fire continuously from all types of weapons, causing damage to city blocks. The enemy will try to interfere by throwing troops against you that have to be overcome.

item.title: Tiny Tanks
item.description: An excellent game for three Tanks in the labyrinth 2 allows you to immerse yourself in exciting battles. You can play against the computer or fight with real opponents. Move your tank through the maze and fall on the enemies, trying to destroy them as quickly as possible. Periodically on the way there will be bonuses.

item.title: Voxel Tanks 3D
item.description: The game is reminiscent of the good old “tanchiki”. Only here is cooler graphics, physics, soundtrack. You need to protect the base so that other tanks cannot destroy it. Around a large brick wall, which is not so difficult to break through. A few volleys will be enough, so you need to respond in time to each breakthrough of the enemy.

item.title: War of Metal
item.description: In the game you will find many improved levels and interesting gameplay. The task is to protect the base (in the form of a rotating radar). Collect various power-ups, smash walls while making your way to enemy tanks, and keep an eye on the number of charges. The most important thing is to prevent the enemy from breaking into the protected zone.
